Literature.Title: Effects of Hydrophobic Amino Acid Substitutions on Antimicrobial Peptide Behavior
Literature.Author: Saint Jean KD, Henderson KD, Chrom CL, Abiuso LE, Renn LM, Caputo GA

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:90% Killing=15 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D31(MIC=0.94µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 27660(MIC=1.88µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700931(MIC=1.88µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=1.88µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MIC=0.94µM)
